fields.message: Basic default color schemes options. If you want change color of individual elements please use Elementor Builder ->  Widget -> Style section.

fields.label: Accent Color #1
fields.name: accent_color1
fields.instructions: Primary accent color (buttons, links, etc). Default is: #3B61DD

fields.label: Accent Color #2
fields.name: accent_color2
fields.instructions: Secondary accent color (breadcrumbs, etc). Default is: #EBA744

fields.label: Accent Color #3
fields.name: accent_color3
fields.instructions: Tertiary accent color (price, badge, selected, etc). Default is: #64BC5F

fields.label: Text Color #1
fields.name: text_color1
fields.instructions: Primary text color (heading). Default is: #383A4E

fields.label: Text Color #2
fields.name: text_color2
fields.instructions: Secondary text color (description etc). Default is: #64688C

fields.label: Text Color #3
fields.name: text_color3
fields.instructions: Tertiary text color (subtitle, placeholders, etc). Default is: #8588A2

fields.label: Background Color #1
fields.name: bg_color1
fields.instructions: Primary background color. Default is: #FFFFFF

fields.label: Background Color #2
fields.name: bg_color2
fields.instructions: Secondary background color. Default is: #F2FFFF

fields.label: Background Color #3
fields.name: bg_color3
fields.instructions: Tertiary background color. Default is: #ECFAFB

fields.message: Basic default typography options. If you want change typography of individual elements please use Elementor Builder ->  Widget -> Style section.

fields.label: Font Size
fields.name: text_font_size
fields.instructions: Base text font size in px. Default is: 15

fields.label: Font Weight
fields.name: text_font_weight
fields.instructions: Base text font weight from 100 to 900. Default is: 400

fields.label: Font Family
fields.name: text_font_family
fields.instructions: Base text font family. Default is: 'Jost'

fields.label: Letter Spacing
fields.name: text_letter_spacing
fields.instructions: Base text letter spacing in px. Default is: 1

fields.label: Font Size
fields.name: heading1_font_size
fields.instructions: Heading & Title font size in px. Default is: 64

fields.label: Font Weight
fields.name: heading1_font_weight
fields.instructions: Heading & Title font weight from 100 to 900. Default is: 600

fields.label: Font Family
fields.name: heading1_font_family
fields.instructions: Heading & Title font family. Default is: 'Jost'

fields.label: Letter Spacing
fields.name: heading1_letter_spacing
fields.instructions: Heading & Title letter spacing in px. Default is: 0

fields.label: Font Size
fields.name: heading2_font_size
fields.instructions: Heading & Title font size in px. Default is: 38

fields.label: Font Weight
fields.name: heading2_font_weight
fields.instructions: Heading & Title font weight from 100 to 900. Default is: 600

fields.label: Font Family
fields.name: heading2_font_family
fields.instructions: Heading & Title font family. Default is: 'Jost'

fields.label: Letter Spacing
fields.name: heading2_letter_spacing
fields.instructions: Heading & Title letter spacing in px. Default is: 0

fields.label: Font Size
fields.name: heading3_font_size
fields.instructions: Heading & Title font size in px. Default is: 24

fields.label: Font Weight
fields.name: heading3_font_weight
fields.instructions: Heading & Title font weight from 100 to 900. Default is: 600

fields.label: Font Family
fields.name: heading3_font_family
fields.instructions: Heading & Title font family. Default is: 'Jost'

fields.label: Letter Spacing
fields.name: heading3_letter_spacing
fields.instructions: Heading & Title letter spacing in px. Default is: 0

fields.label: Font Size
fields.name: heading4_font_size
fields.instructions: Heading & Title font size in px. Default is: 20

fields.label: Font Weight
fields.name: heading4_font_weight
fields.instructions: Heading & Title font weight from 100 to 900. Default is: 600

fields.label: Font Family
fields.name: heading4_font_family
fields.instructions: Heading & Title font family. Default is: 'Jost'

fields.label: Letter Spacing
fields.name: heading4_letter_spacing
fields.instructions: Heading & Title letter spacing in px. Default is: 0

fields.label: Font Size
fields.name: menu_font_size
fields.instructions: Menu Items font size in px. Default is: 15

fields.label: Font Weight
fields.name: menu_font_weight
fields.instructions: Menu items font weight from 100 to 900. Default is: 400

fields.label: Font Family
fields.name: menu_font_family
fields.instructions: Menu Items font family. Default is: 'Jost'

fields.label: Letter Spacing
fields.name: menu_letter_spacing
fields.instructions: Menu Items letter spacing in px. Default is: 1

fields.message: Basic default buttons options. If you want change button styles of individual elements please use Elementor Builder ->  Widget -> Style section.

fields.label: Text Color
fields.name: btn_text_color
fields.instructions: Button text color. Default is: #FFFFFF

fields.label: Background Color
fields.name: btn_bg_color
fields.instructions: Button background color. Default is: #3B61DD

fields.label: Border Color
fields.name: btn_border_color
fields.instructions: Button border color. Default is: #FFFFFF

fields.label: Font Size
fields.name: btn_font_size
fields.instructions: Button text font size in px. Default is: 15

fields.label: Font Weight
fields.name: btn_font_weight
fields.instructions: Button text font weight from 100 to 900. Default is: 400

fields.label: Font Family
fields.name: btn_font_family
fields.instructions: Button text font family. Default is: 'Jost'

fields.label: Letter Spacing
fields.name: btn_letter_spacing
fields.instructions: Button text letter spacing in px. Default is: 2

fields.label: Text Transform
fields.name: btn_transform
fields.instructions: Button text transform. Default is: Normal

fields.label: Border Size
fields.name: btn_border_size
fields.instructions: Button border size in px. If you want remove border, set value to 0. Default is: 10

fields.label: Border Radius
fields.name: btn_border_radius
fields.instructions: Button border radius in px. Default is: 50

fields.label: Height
fields.name: btn_height
fields.instructions: Button height in px. Default is: 50

fields.message: Basic default breadcrumbs options. If you want change breadcrumbs styles of individual page or section please use Elementor Builder ->  Widget -> Style section.

fields.label: Text Color
fields.name: brc_text_color
fields.instructions: Breadcrumbs text color. Default is: #FFFFFF

fields.label: Background Color
fields.name: brc_bg_color
fields.instructions: Breadcrumbs background color. Default is: #EBA744

fields.label: Border Color
fields.name: brc_border_color
fields.instructions: Breadcrumbs border color. Default is: #FFFFFF

fields.label: Font Size
fields.name: brc_font_size
fields.instructions: Breadcrumbs text font size in px. Default is: 15

fields.label: Font Weight
fields.name: brc_font_weight
fields.instructions: Breadcrumbs text font weight from 100 to 900. Default is: 400

fields.label: Font Family
fields.name: brc_font_family
fields.instructions: Breadcrumbs text font family. Default is: 'Jost'

fields.label: Letter Spacing
fields.name: brc_letter_spacing
fields.instructions: Breadcrumbs text letter spacing in px. Default is: 2

fields.label: Border Size
fields.name: brc_border_size
fields.instructions: Breadcrumbs border size in px. If you want remove border, set value to 0. Default is: 10

fields.label: Border Radius
fields.name: brc_border_radius
fields.instructions: Breadcrumbs border radius in px. Default is: 50

fields.label: Enable Calendar Customizations?
fields.name: calendar_custom
fields.instructions: Used this options you can overwrite pre-defined styles for Calendar Skin ( Accommodations -> Settings -> Calendar Theme ).
